channel.title: I need help with two things
channel.description:
First problem: I want to make an object require a member status to be able to be used? Second Problem: what do i search for to change the maximum levels? Please help me.
If there is anything you need to know to help me, Let me know i try to get it for you.

item.title: I need help with two things
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

1 - Example;

case objectid: if (playerIsMember != 1) //or (!playerIsMember) if used as boolean return; //resthere break;

2 - getLevelForXP method

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with two things
